name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior SAP Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance solutions with a focus on configuration, troubleshooting, and root-cause analysis in the SAP environment. Highly proficient in providing technical support while leveraging strong analytical skills to solve complex problems effectively and enhance system performance.
Demonstrated excellence in cross-functional collaboration and communication, facilitating seamless interactions with stakeholders and team members. Original strengths include an extensive tech stack encompassing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**.
Expert in AI/ML-powered platform development for predictive analytics, with hands-on experience deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure** and implementing microservices and CI/CD pipelines. Committed to compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
